variables.name: Status
variables.pattern: (.*?)
variables.replace1: <td width="200" height="29" align="left" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly; color: #80b4ff; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 20px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 1px;">|-

variables.name: Points
variables.pattern: (.*?)
variables.replace1: <td width="81" height="29" align="center" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly; color: #80b4ff; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 20px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 1px;">|-

variables.name: Jeans
variables.pattern: (.*?) Jeans
variables.replace1: <td width="66" height="29" align="center" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly; color: #80b4ff; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 20px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 1px;">|-
variables.replace2: Jeans |-

variables.name: Bra's
variables.pattern: (.*?) Bras
variables.replace1: <td width="66" height="29" align="center" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#ffffff" style="mso-line-height-rule: exactly; color: #80b4ff; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 20px; line-height: 20px; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 1px;">|-
variables.replace2: Bras |-
